body.transcript:
Hello, thank you for calling Melody Music School. My name is Albert Taylor. How can I assist you today?

Hi Albert, this is Tammy Thomas. I'm feeling a bit down today and I was hoping to get more information about your music therapy classes.

I'm sorry to hear that you're feeling down, Tammy. Our music therapy sessions can be quite uplifting. May I have your phone number to send you more details?

Sure, my phone number is eight six seven five three zero nine.

Thank you, Tammy. Could I also have your email address to send you some resources and the class schedule?

Absolutely, it's tammy.thomas@example.com.

Thank you, Tammy. Our therapy sessions are designed to lift your spirits and help express emotions through music. I'll send all the information to your email shortly.

That sounds wonderful, Albert. I really appreciate your help.

You're welcome, Tammy. I hope the sessions will be beneficial for you. Thank you for reaching out to us.

Thank you, Albert. You've been very helpful.

Thank you for your time today, Tammy. If you have any more questions, feel free to contact us anytime. Have a great day!
